title: Plastic Straw Pipette - YouTube
body: This is a makeshift pipette made of Plastic Straw.This project is very easy, and you can distribute soy sauce or something with this pipette.
readable_content:
-@franslam7398 (2020-12-10): This was very good. Just made one but I sealed the top on mine. Many thanks!
-@upcycle (2016-12-05): great inexpensive idea.. can be used for all kind of things that require long length pipettes or to be disposable. like for medicen of foods.. sauces.. paints. 
-@hensenh7123 (2020-12-10): cool!!!This helped me in my science experiment.I did not have a pipette!!
-@adamgm84 (2020-12-10): lol I was looking for an icing pipette, but this is also some rad science.
-@luisaquino9342 (2021-12-10): Great, for transfer perfume !!!! Thank you!!
-@stocksreview6168 (2015-12-05): Is it possible to make it into a dropper by sealing the top?
    -@kayanna55 (2021-12-10): Pity they banned plastic straws where I live so now I can't use this for my science work
    -@CYXXYC (2015-12-05): Nice one for Physics (science) lesson at school
-@yanodat2926 (2015-12-05): I can finally make good use of the juul pods with juice on one side
-@hde2628 (2015-12-05): 스포이드~!ㅎㅎ! 신기하네영
-@Ryan-wm5xp (2015-12-05): Cool
-@AhmadzairiBinOsman (2015-12-05): Ringkas tapi berguna
